Hi! I am a user of JUnit and project contributor in github.

I am glad to s=
ay that we extended Categories with new feature in pull request https://git=
hub.com/KentBeck/junit/pull/503
This extension is not yet in KentBeck repo,=
 however the implementation and tests are ready.

In JUnit we got a consens=
us of anotations design and behavior, but we do not have consensus in javad=
oc for Categories class.

We would like to ask you to have a look and help =
us refine the Javadoc, which finally would help to all users of JUnit.

Our=
 main goal is to declare many inclusive/exclusive categories on the top of =
a test suite, unlike the old Categories.java runner which used just only on=
e category.

There is Maven community with surefire-plugin, which may use t=
his extension known as groups -currently they only use a single group.

Not=
e: you'r welcome to login to www.github.com and contribute to the pull #503=
 i mentioned above.

Thx, Tibor
